## Assigned Contractor

外包指派

- GitHub: @external-user
- Contact: email / Discord / 外部網站

---

## Task Description

**請先閱讀（Please read first）：**

- README.md

- 請依據參考資料，完成對應程式碼與相關測項  
  Please implement the required code and related test cases based on the provided references.



- 在本地端通過相關測項  
  All specified tests must pass in the local development environment.


---

## Acceptance Criteria

以下條件**全部成立**，視為任務完成：  
The task is considered complete only when **all** of the following are satisfied:

- [ ] 本 PR **僅對應一個已指派的 Issue**  
      This PR corresponds to **one and only one assigned Issue**.

- [ ] 所有需求已依 Issue 描述完成  
      All requirements described in the Issue have been fully implemented.

- [ ] 程式碼符合 issue 指定的參考風格與結構  
      The code follows the coding style and structure specified in the Issue.

- [ ] 已在本地端通過 issue 指定的測試  
      All tests specified in the Issue pass locally.


---

##  Delivery 

- Fork 本 repository  
  Fork this repository to your own GitHub account.

- 依照 Issue 描述完成任務  
  Complete the task strictly according to the Issue description.

- 提交 Pull Request 到本 repository  
  Submit a Pull Request back to this repository.

---

##  Note

- 本 Issue 僅授權給被指派的外包者  
  This Issue is authorized **only** for the assigned contractor.

- 未經指派的 PR 將不予審查  
  Pull Requests submitted without prior assignment will not be reviewed.

---
